acceptance-test-run.title: Open Employee Management and verify paging last, first, next, previous
acceptance-test-run.name: Open Employee Management and verify paging last, first, next, previous

test-group.name: [1] {employeeMenu=Employee Management, parentMenuText=Common, nextPage=next, lastPage=last, previousPage=previous, firstPage=first}

test-step.description: When I open submenu Employee Management of parent menu Common

test-group.name: And In Employee Management screen, I click button next page on paging

test-step.description: Click page with name on paging: next

test-step.description: Then In Employee Management screen, Table should show next page
When In Employee Management screen, I click button last page on paging
Then In Employee Management screen, Table should show last page
When In Employee Management screen, I click button previous page on paging
Then In Employee Management screen, Table should show previous page
When In Employee Management screen, I click button first page on paging
Then In Employee Management screen, Table should show first page
